insert into metaData.t_metadata_db_index_temp (index_id, index_name, table_name, is_unique, index_schema, column_name, index_type) values
(#{item.indexId}, #{item.indexName}, #{item.tableName}, #{item.isUnique}, #{item.indexSchema}, #{item.columnName}, #{item.indexType})

insert into metaData.t_metadata_db_index (index_id, index_name, table_name, is_unique, index_schema, column_name, index_type, update_time) select a.index_id, a.index_name, a.table_name, a.is_unique, a.index_schema, a.column_name, a.index_type, now() from metaData.t_metadata_db_index_temp a left join metaData.t_metadata_db_index b on a.index_name = b.index_name where b.index_name is null
